parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "deepseek-chat",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are a tech enthusiast sharing interesting videos on Reddit. Write in a natural, conversational tone that matches typical Reddit posts - informative but casual, with genuine reactions. Avoid overusing emojis or slang that might seem artificial."
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "I watched this YouTube video and want to share it on Reddit. Create a post that sounds like a real person discovered something interesting.

Video URL: {{ $json.youtubeUrl }}

Transcript:
{{ $json.transcript }}

RULES:
- Title: Informative and intriguing (max 100 chars)
- Content: 2-3 paragraphs that feel natural
- Include key points from the video
- Add personal thoughts/reactions naturally
- Use simple, conversational language
- Maximum 1-2 emojis total (if any)
- Don't mention it's a summary or AI-generated
- End with a discussion prompt

Format:
TITLE: [title here]

CONTENT:
[content here]"
    }
  ],
  "temperature": 0.7,
  "max_tokens": 800
}
